newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Randfontein declares interim div.
newsitem.headline: Randfontein declares interim div.

text.p: Full name: The Randfontein Estates Gold Mining Company Witwatersrand Ltd

NOTE - The company said it would award capitalisation shares to shareholders registered on December 27. The number of new shares to which shareholders would be entitled would be determined by applying to their shareholdings the ratio that 52.5 cents bears to the weighted averaged trade price of Randfontein's shares on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange during the three-day period ending January 30 1997.
Based on the calculated price, the total value that each shareholder would receive per share held on the record date would be equivalent to 42 cents.

The company said the purpose of the capitalisation award was to retain funds in the company as working capital and assist in financing the proposed exploitation of the South Reef at the Doornkop section of the mine.
